disconnectionForLobbyNoLongerAvailable() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.EchoClient
This method is called when the server notifies the client that the lobby where he was is no longer available (3 players logged in or game started) It provides to close the server socket and to notify the view of this event.
